1.author: Walt Disney
1.thought: The Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.

2.author: Winston Churchill
2.thought: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.

3.author: Morrie Schwartz
3.thought: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.

4.author: C.J. Redwine
4.thought: No matter what has happened. No matter what youâ€™ve done. No matter what you will do. I will always love you. I swear it.

5.author: Doug Firebough
5.thought: Every day, do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.

6.author: Marcus Aurelius
6.thought: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature.

7.author: Marcus Aurelius
7.thought: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
